shortDescription: Located in Geylang, this hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Parkway Parade and Paya Lebar Square. Singapore Sports Hub and Singapore National Stadium are also within 3 mi (5 km).

hotelOverviewText.content: Located in Geylang, this hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Parkway Parade and Paya Lebar Square. Singapore Sports Hub and Singapore National Stadium are also within 3 mi (5 km).
hotelOverviewText.name: Location

hotelOverviewText.content: Along with dry cleaning, this smoke-free hotel has a 24-hour front desk and tour/ticket assistance. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Other amenities include a front-desk safe.
hotelOverviewText.name: Hotel Features

hotelOverviewText.content: All 90 rooms offer free WiFi, cable TV, and free bottled water. Hair dryers, showers, and free toiletries are among the other amenities that guests will find.
hotelOverviewText.name: Room Amenities

hotelRoomResponse.cancellationPolicy:
We understand that sometimes plans fall through. We do not charge a cancel or change fee. When the hotel charges such fees in accordance with its own policies, the cost will be passed on to you. The Fragrance Hotel (Joo Chiat) charges the following cancellation and change fees.

The room type and rate selected are non-refundable. Should you change or cancel this reservation for any reason, your payment will not be refunded.

No refunds will be issued for late check-in or early check-out.

Stay extensions require a new reservation.

Your room will be guaranteed for late arrival.

Hotel supplier loyalty points and/or airline miles may not be awarded when booking Expedia Special Rate hotels.

We understand that sometimes plans fall through. We do not charge a cancel or change fee. When the hotel charges such fees in accordance with its own policies, the cost will be passed on to you. The Fragrance Hotel (Joo Chiat) charges the following cancellation and change fees.

If a late check-in is planned, contact this hotel directly for their late check-in policy.

longDescription:
Location: Located in Geylang, this hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Parkway Parade and Paya Lebar Square. Singapore Sports Hub and Singapore National Stadium are also within 3 mi (5 km).

Hotel Features: Along with dry cleaning, this smoke-free hotel has a 24-hour front desk and tour/ticket assistance. Free WiFi in public areas and free self parking are also provided. Other amenities include a front-desk safe.

Room Amenities: All 90 rooms offer free WiFi, cable TV, and free bottled water. Hair dryers, showers, and free toiletries are among the other amenities that guests will find.

Rooms
The Fragrance Hotel (Joo Chiat) offers 90 air-conditioned accommodations with complimentary bottled water and hair dryers. Televisions come with cable channels. Bathrooms include showers and complimentary toiletries. This Singapore hotel provides complimentary wireless high-speed Internet access. Housekeeping is offered daily and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Property Amenities
The Fragrance Hotel (Joo Chiat) features tour/ticket assistance, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Public areas are equipped with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access. Limited complimentary onsite parking is available on a first-come, first-served basis. A total renovation of this property was completed in July 2016. The Fragrance Hotel (Joo Chiat) is a smoke-free property.

  • 24-hour front desk
  • Total number of rooms - 90
  • Number of floors - 5
  • Dry cleaning/laundry service
  • Elevator/lift
  • Tours/ticket assistance
  • Free WiFi
  • Safe-deposit box at front desk
  • Free self parking
  • Parking (limited spaces)
  • Year Built 2001
  • Smoke-free property
  • Number of buildings/towers - 1

Room Amenities

  • In-room climate control (air conditioning)
  • Air conditioning
  • Free bottled water
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Private bathroom
  • Free toiletries
  • Hair dryer
  • Shower only
  • Cable TV service
  • Iron/ironing board (on request)
  • Free WiFi

Points of Interest

  • Parkway Parade - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
  • Paya Lebar Square - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
  • Singapore Sports Hub - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
  • Singapore National Stadium - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
  • Singapore Indoor Stadium - 3.2 km / 2 mi
  • Kallang Wave Mall - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
  • Bedok Mall - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
  • Air Force Museum - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
  • Golden Mile Complex - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
  • Haji Lane - 4.8 km / 3 mi
  • Singapore Flyer - 4.8 km / 3 mi
  • Cloud Forest - 5 km / 3.1 mi
  • Alive Museum - 5 km / 3.1 mi
  • Suntec City - 5 km / 3.1 mi
  • Marina Barrage - 5 km / 3.1 mi
The closest major airports to The Fragrance Hotel (Joo Chiat) are:Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 10.9 km / 6.8 miBatam Batu Besar (BTH-Hang Nadim) - 31.7 km / 19.7 miJohor Bahru (JHB-Senai Intl.) - 44.6 km / 27.7 miThe preferred airport for The Fragrance Hotel (Joo Chiat) is Singapore (SIN-Changi). Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 km and mile.

Policies

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Check-in time starts at 3 PM
  • Pets not allowed
  • Check-out time is noon
  • American Express
  • JCB International
  • MasterCard
  • Visa
  • No rollaway/extra beds available
  • No cribs (infant beds) available
  • Minimum check-in age is 18

• Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Check-in time starts at 3 PM
  • Pets not allowed
  • Check-out time is noon
  • American Express
  • JCB International
  • MasterCard

  • No rollaway/extra beds available

  • Minimum check-in age is 18

firstHotelOverview: Located in Geylang, this hotel is within 1 mi (2 km) of Parkway Parade and Paya Lebar Square. Singapore Sports Hub and Singapore National Stadium are also within 3 mi (5 km).
hotelTagline: Hotel with free self parking, in Singapore (Geylang)

hotelAmenitiesText.content:
The Fragrance Hotel (Joo Chiat) features tour/ticket assistance, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Public areas are equipped with complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access. Limited complimentary onsite parking is available on a first-come, first-served basis. A total renovation of this property was completed in July 2016.

The Fragrance Hotel (Joo Chiat) is a smoke-free property.

  • 24-hour front desk
  • Total number of rooms - 90
  • Number of floors - 5
